mapper.select: select tmid from tm_member where did=#{2} and didtype=#{1} and mid=#{0}
SELECT * FROM tm_member a WHERE a.mid=#{0} AND a.didtype=#{1} AND a.did=#{2}
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_member a SET a.tmstatus='01' WHERE a.mid=#{0}
UPDATE tm_member a SET a.tmstatus='01',a.delflg='01' WHERE a.tmid =#{0}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '普通高等院校'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','普通高等院校'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='普通高等院校' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','普通高等院校'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='普通高等院校' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'普通高等院校'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='普通高等院校' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','普通高等院校'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='普通高等院校' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','普通高等院校'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='普通高等院校' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='职业学校（含高职、中职）' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='职业学校（含高职、中职）' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='职业学校（含高职、中职）' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='职业学校（含高职、中职）' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','职业学校（含高职、中职）'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='职业学校（含高职、中职）' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '高中'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','高中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='高中' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','高中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='高中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'高中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='高中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','高中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='高中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','高中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='高中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '初中'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','初中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='初中' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','初中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='初中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'初中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='初中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','初中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='初中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','初中'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='初中' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '小学'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','小学'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='小学' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','小学'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='小学' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'小学'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='小学' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','小学'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='小学' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','小学'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='小学' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '幼儿园'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','幼儿园'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='幼儿园' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','幼儿园'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='幼儿园' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'幼儿园'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='幼儿园' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','幼儿园'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='幼儿园' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','幼儿园'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='幼儿园' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '其他'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','其他'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.orgtype='其他' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','其他'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='其他' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'其他'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='其他' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','其他'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='其他' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','其他'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.orgtype='其他' AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`

SELECT a.`组织机构`,b.teamnum,c.`指导教师男`,d.`指导教师女`,(c.`指导教师男`+d.`指导教师女`)AS'指导教师合计',e.`参赛队员男`,f.`参赛队员女`,(e.`参赛队员男`+f.`参赛队员女`)as'参赛队员合计' FROM (SELECT '合计'AS'组织机构') a LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.tid)AS'teamnum','合计'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_team a WHERE a.mid=#{mid} AND a.delflg='00' AND a.tstatus='00' ) b ON b.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师男','合计'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) c ON c.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'指导教师女' ,'合计'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='01' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) d ON d.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员男','合计'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='01' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) e ON e.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构` LEFT JOIN( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.tmid)AS'参赛队员女','合计'AS'组织机构' FROM tm_member b LEFT JOIN re_raceteammember a ON a.tmid=b.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid=a.tid WHERE b.roleflg='02' AND b.sex='02' AND a.mid=#{mid} AND c.delflg='00' AND c.tstatus='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' ) f ON f.`组织机构`=a.`组织机构`
SELECT COUNT(a.tmid) FROM tm_member a WHERE a.tmcode=#{0}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.tmname ORDER BY a.serialnum) FROM( SELECT a.serialnum,b.tmname FROM re_raceteammember a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON b.tmid=a.tmid WHERE a.tid=#{0} AND a.rid=#{1} AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' AND b.roleflg='02' ORDER BY a.serialnum ) a

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.tmname ORDER BY a.serialnum) FROM( SELECT a.serialnum,b.tmname FROM re_raceteammember a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON b.tmid=a.tmid WHERE a.tid=#{0} AND a.rid=#{1} AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' AND b.roleflg='01' ORDER BY a.serialnum ) a
SELECT b.email FROM re_raceteammember a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON a.tmid=b.tmid WHERE a.tid=#{0} AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00' AND b.roleflg='02'AND a.rid=#{1} ORDER BY a.serialnum LIMIT 0,1
SELECT b.tmid,b.tmcode,b.tmname,b.roleflg,a.entryno FROM re_raceteammember a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON a.tmid=b.tmid WHERE a.tid=#{0} AND a.rid=#{1} AND b.delflg='00' AND b.tmstatus='00'
select count(*) from tm_member where did=#{2} and didtype=#{1} and mid!=#{0}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.tmid,b.tmname,b.picurl,b.roleflg,b.diningtype ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.tid) AS tid,GROUP_CONCAT(c.tcode) AS tcode,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.tname) AS tname ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT c.school) AS school,GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT c.region) AS region ,GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT e.uname order by convert(e.uname using gbk) asc) AS uname,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT e.email) AS uemail ,GROUP_CONCAT(d.rname) AS rname
FROM re_raceteammember a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON b.tmid = a.tmid LEFT JOIN tm_team c ON c.tid = a.tid LEFT JOIN ma_race d ON d.rid = a.rid LEFT JOIN os_user e ON e.uid = a.signuid LEFT JOIN sys_folk g ON g.folkid = b.folk LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.tid,GROUP_CONCAT(b.tmname) AS tchname FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.tid,a.tmid FROM re_raceteammember a WHERE a.mid=#{0} ) a LEFT JOIN tm_member b ON b.tmid = a.tmid WHERE b.roleflg='01' GROUP BY a.tid ) f ON f.tid = c.tid WHERE a.mid=#{0} GROUP BY a.tmid ) a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.region,a.school,convert(a.uname using gbk) asc,a.tid,a.tmid
